name: Android: Netrunner
about: A two-player game set in the dystopian future of the Android universe. Each game is played as a battle between a megacorporation and a hacker in a duel to take control of data.

name: Triple Triad homemade game
about: Only published in Japan. This is my homemade board game, based on a minigame, featured in an RPG video game. What?

name: Time Ninja
about: In this endless running game, help Nia Ninja reclaim her clan's lost treasure. Just don't let Jay-the-Jet hit you with his energy blasts.

name: Killer Queen
about: Killer Queen is a real-time strategy platform video game developed by Josh DeBonis and Nikita Mikros. The video game is based on a physical game created by the same people

name: TEKKEN
about: Tekken was one of the first fighting games at the time to use 3D animation., and the series series itself is the best selling fighting game franchise in history.

name: Streets of Rage 2
about: Side-scrolling beat-em-up. Best version released on Sega Genesis. Also has a great soundtrack

name: Gifts I Might Enjoy (G.I.M.E.)
about: G.I.M.E. is a wish-list web app. After registering, users can save their wish lists. Gift givers can then lookup recipients by username and view their wish-list.  Created with: Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose, Handlebars

name: H.A.D.E.S.- How Anyone Dies In Every State
about: H.A.D.E.S. is a death dashboard. It crosschecks a user's basic demographic information against 2014 CDC mortality statistics. The resulting data is used to generate graphs:  -Top mortality threats for that user's demographic.  -A longitudinal study, showing the #1 threat's change over lifetime.

name: Deception: Murder In Hong Kong
about: players find themselves in a scenario of intrigue and murder, deduction and deception. One player is the Murderer, secretly choosing their weapon and the evidence they leave behind. Another is the Forensic Scientist who holds the key to convicting the criminal but is only able to express their knowledge through analysis of the scene.
